channel.title: Burgers on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Burgers on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Krusty Burger
item.description: This was my first time ever to Universal Orlando, so I was pretty excited to see how this differed compared to Universal Hollywood. One of my favorite rides over there was the Backlot Tour, and behold, we realized there is no such thing as a backlot in Universal Orlando. This was purely a theme park. After we rode The Minion ride, my cousin wanted to show me the Simpsons area.
